channel.title: Please Help 'Error Connecting To Server'
channel.description:
Im Using This Client/Source: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,492977.0.html
I Have Portforwarded And I Know That Cus I Have Hosted A Minecrfat Server And A RSPS Before.... I Dont Know What To Do....

item.title: Please Help 'Error Connecting To Server'
item.dc:creator: @raininhell raininhell
item.description:
@raininhell wrote:

Like i said everything is portforwarded if i wanted i could get a crappy source and play now but heres the thing the only problem im having is connecting the client to the server the server is currently 317 PI and the client i have changed it to all the ips i know of which is my 192.168.1.110 and 68.103.191.94 i have tried those both even 127.0.0.1 and none of it worked

Read full topic

item.title: Please Help 'Error Connecting To Server'
item.dc:creator: @segaxvi segaxvi
item.description:
@segaxvi wrote:

If you’ve portfowarded manually, reset your router.
If with utorrent close utorrent and no-ip, then run UTORRENT first then run NO-IP then rune SOURCE.
Tell me if this works.

Read full topic

item.title: Please Help 'Error Connecting To Server'
item.dc:creator: @ford_rock99 ford rock99
item.description:
@ford_rock99 wrote:

first question is, is it 508+? have u made sure u changed all the ip addresses and the ports, is it a error or just wont connect?

Read full topic

item.title: Please Help 'Error Connecting To Server'
item.dc:creator: @voetbal645 voetbal645
item.description:
@voetbal645 wrote:

  • Are you sure, that you have closed utorrent if u are running it?
  • Did u have change the ip in client.java?
  • Are u sure the source isn’t running on a different port then the client?
  • Are you sure that your firewall isn’t running because it will block the port.

Read full topic
